articles.title: DPRK Will Settle Damage Incurred by Sanctions of U.S. and Its Followers
articles.content:
DPRK Will Settle Damage Incurred by Sanctions of U.S. and Its Followers
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson of the Sanctions Damage Investigation Committee of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea issued the following statement on Friday:
					 Today, the manoeuvres of the U.S. and its followers to sanction and stifle the DPRK have reached the extremely vicious and barbarous phase in their attempt to obliterate the rights to existence and development of our State and people, destroy the modern civilization and turn the world back into a dark mediaeval age.
					
					 They turned away even the articles of the UN Security Council "resolutions" which stipulated that the sanctions should not give negative impact on the humanitarian assistances of the UN agencies which are influenced by the sanctions, although they are conducted in a more transparent way. This is the reality today.
					
					 The assistances of the UN agencies undertaken in all regions and countries of the world contribute to carrying out the noble missions of the UN aimed at securing global peace and security, developing international relations and promoting international cooperation in economic, social and cultural fields as well as other various areas.
					
					 However, the United States and its followers cut off the normal economic and trade activities of the DPRK in all-round way and resort to the unprecedented sanctions and stifling acts in their attempt to obliterate even the basic right to existence. They go even further to take issue with the assistances of the UN agencies which are conducted without any snag and impede their implementation in every way possible.
					
					 Unlike in other countries, the assistances of all the UN agencies in the DPRK including UNDP, UNICEF and UNFPA are taking place under the strict supervision of the sanctions committee of the UNSC.
					
					 As a result, the banking channel of the UN agencies is suspended, delivery of aid goods is delayed and even the ordinary daily consumer goods are restricted under the pretext of dual use, thus creating tremendous obstacles in the protection of the rights and existence of the children and women and causing damage to the people's livelihood, nothing to say of the civilian economy. 
					
					 Unable to resist strong backlash within and without, they claim to have allowed the transfer service of fund for UN agencies resident in the DPRK. However, due to the absence of practical measures, the transfer service is suspended and the assistances are not progressing.    
					
					 The delivery of Mobile Digital X-ray equipment and reagents for diagnosis of Tuberclosis, insecticides for Malaria vector control and Emergency Reproductive Health Kits procured and provided by the UN agencies including UNICEF and UNFPA for protection and promotion of the health of children and women have been delayed for several months under the unjustifiable pretext of various reasons in the countries of sale and transit this year. The Gene Xpert Cartridge for diagnosis of Multi-Drugs Resistant tuberculosis patients have not been delivered at all since 2017.   
					
					 This is a clear act of human rights violation that denies and infringes upon the right to a standard of living adequate for health and well-being including clothing, food, housing, medical care and necessary social services stipulated in the Universal Declaration of Human Rights 
					
					 Thus, it is obvious that the aim of the sanction is to overthrow the system of the DPRK by isolating and stifling it and intentionally bring about humanitarian disaster, instead of "preventing weapons development" as claimed by the U.S. and its followers.  
					
					 The more unprecedentedly harshest sanctions and strongest pressure the U.S. and its followers impose on the DPRK, the higher the banners of independence, simultaneous development and self-reliance it will uphold, and thus settle the damage to the end incurred by the sanction, decisively frustrating the reckless nuclear war moves and the despicable plot of sanctions and pressure of the enemies.

articles.title: U.S. Warmongers' Reckless Action Denounced
articles.content:
U.S. Warmongers' Reckless Action Denounced
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea Thursday issued a statement in denunciation of the reckless military action of the U.S. warmongers obsessed with the anachronistic ambition for stifling the DPRK which is reaching the extreme line.
					 According to the statement, on Oct. 10 brass hats of the U.S. military at the Department of Defense reported to Trump the military options toward the DPRK. They focused on military options that ensure an intensive and surprise, preemptive attack, avoiding a total war as much as possible and minimizing their losses.
					
					 Of those options, the "decapitation operation" accompanied by a cyber warfare was chosen as the best way. Under this plan, they reportedly discussed for a long time on the issues of accurate location of north Korea's supreme leadership by such latest spy means as satellites and drones, precision strike by long-distance attack means including nuclear strategic bombers, destruction of core facilities and nuclear and missile bases in the north by infiltration of highly trained special operation forces and cyber warfare based on vicious virus Stuxnet, etc.
					
					 This shows that the U.S. started a war against the DPRK without declaration under its most dangerous war scenario, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 After all, the Korean peninsula is now put into the worst situation in which the outbreak of a nuclear war can never be averted.
					
					 It is the invariable and resolute counteraction method of Juche Korea to mercilessly punish the war maniacs with fire.
					
					 Those who dare challenge our supreme leadership should be found out and wiped out to the last one wherever they may be. This is the strong and fixed will of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 As been already declared, we will take the unimaginable toughest counteraction to bring the bitterest end and total destruction to the U.S. mainland, not "minimum loss", if Trump finally ignites a war, obsessed with illusion of "decapitation" and paralysis of commanding system by cyber warfare.
					
					 In case the present situation of the Korean peninsula goes to the worst phase, the U.S. is entirely to blame for it.

articles.title: Congratulations to Mongolian FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Mongolian FM
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Ho, foreign minister of the DPRK, sent a congratulatory message to D. Tsogtbaatar on his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs of Mongolia on Oct. 19.
					 The message expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative ties between the two countries with long history and tradition would continue to develop in the interests of the two peoples, wishing him success in his work.

articles.title: Malian President Meets DPRK Ambassador
articles.content:
Malian President Meets DPRK Ambassador
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- Ri Chong Gyong, DPRK ambassador to Mali, presented his credentials to Malian President Ibrahim Boubacar Keita on October 6.
					 The president said the friendly relations between the two countries are the historic relations forged by former President of Mali Modibo Keita and President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Noting that the Korean government and people rendered material and moral assistance to the efforts of the Malian government and people for independent development and construction of a new society, the president went on:
					
					 The DPRK has invariably supported and helped Mali.
					
					 The bilateral friendly relations forged by HE President Kim Il Sung were further developed by HE Kim Jong Il and are being carried forward by respected HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Each country has the right to defend its sovereignty and the international community should respect independent rights of individual countries.
					
					 Watching Pyongyang spruce up on TV, I could feel the DPRK achieve great changes in the economic construction and the efforts to improve the people's living standard

articles.title: Int'l Sci-Tech Exhibition of Furniture and Building Materials Closes
articles.content:
Int'l Sci-Tech Exhibition of Furniture and Building Materials Closes
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- There closed Pyongyang International Sci-tech Exhibition of Furniture and Building Materials which was opened on Oct. 16.
					 Goods presented from the Chollima General Building-Materials Factory, the Yonggwang Furniture Joint Venture Company and other companies of the DPRK and foreign companies were popular among visitors.
					
					 During the exhibition there took place a workshop on the subjects "Method of Production of Colored Granite", "Indoor Design", etc.
					
					 The closing ceremony was held at the Sci-Tech Complex on Oct. 20.
					
					 Attending it were officials and researchers and teachers from commissions, ministries and national institutions and scientific and educational institutions and relevant units and delegations of foreign countries and regions.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Beninese Figure
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Beninese Figure
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader".
					 The gift was handed over to the DPRK ambassador to Benin on Oct. 14.
					
					 Meanwhile, Vasili Kirzapkin, general director of Kvid Co. Ltd. of Russia, presented a gift to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 72nd anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. The gift was conveyed to an official concerned of the DPRK working in Russia on Sept. 22.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Political Party of Mali
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Political Party of Mali
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greetings from Tiemoko Sangare, chairman of the African Party for the Solidarity and Justice of Mali, on Oct. 11.
					 Tiemoko Sangare in the message extended the warmest congratulations, on behalf of all members of his party and on his own behalf, to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 72nd anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Wishing Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and greater success in his work, the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative ties between the two parties would favorably develop in the common interests of the two peoples in the future, too.
					
					 It also hoped that the Korean people would register greater successes in their struggle for national reunification and the building of a powerful socialist country.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- A home-visiting group of Koreans in Japan led by Pak Yong Gi, vice-director of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Friday.
					 They laid bouquets at the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Delegation of Board of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Board of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Leaves
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Board of Directors of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation led by Vice-Chairman Keith Bennet left here Friday.

articles.title: Black Rice and Its Processed Foods Good for Health
articles.content:
Black Rice and Its Processed Foods Good for Health 
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The Rice Research Institute of the Institute of Agricultural Science in the DPRK newly bred strains of black rice good for health.
					 The high-yielding new strains are helpful to those people to promote health through diet.
					
					 The institute established a scientific cultivation technology process through research on the growth of strains. It settled technical problems arising in processing unpolished black rice and made efficacious health foods.
					
					 These foods contain iron, calcium, magnesium and other mineral matters, various vitamins, protein, amino acid, etc.
					
					 The processed foods are good for preventing and treating vascular diseases, liver diseases, kidney diseases and beriberi. It is also efficacious for the nutrition care of expectants and nursing mothers and the old and for children's stature.
					
					 These strains were appreciated at the 32nd National Sci-tech Festival and the 15th National Invention and New Technology Exhibition.

articles.title: Factories Conducive to Improvement of People's Diet
articles.content:
Factories Conducive to Improvement of People's Diet
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- Factories conducive to the improvement of the people's diet are on the increase in the DPRK. They are producing traditional dishes in an industrial way.
					 The Ryugyong Fermented Soybean Factory in Thongil Street produces fermented soybean and bean-curd preserved in soy.
					
					 When interviewed by KCNA, Jong In Chol, manager of the factory, said:
					
					 The factory has put production processes on an automated, germ-free and dust-free basis and established the computer integrated manufacturing. It also has a fermented soybean production process.
					
					 Fermented soybean contains protein, vitamins and protease, good for treatment and prevention of vascular diseases.
					
					 The Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory in Songyo District, too, is producing fermented soybean, dried fermented soybean, boiled bean and spices, etc.
					
					 All its production processes ranging from preparation of raw materials to packing are automated and streamlined.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Terms Trump Nuclear Fanatic
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Terms Trump Nuclear Fanatic
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. nuclear hysteria for world domination has reached its height.
					 Trump cried out for "building nuclear capabilities in a big scale" until the world "has the ability to discern the might of the U.S." Recently he reeled off rubbish that the U.S. hopes to increase the number of nuclear warheads to the level at the end of the 1960s when it possessed 32 000.
					
					 Timed to coincide with Trump's call for ten-fold increase of the nuclear warheads, the U.S. Defense Department buckled down to putting into practice the long-term plan for "overall momentary strike" to neutralize the forces of Russia and China in just 60 minutes.
					
					 The keynote of its plan is to neutralize any countries by intensive strike by non nuclear force within an hour and thus give the rival ready to make a counterstrike no opportunity for using strategic and tactical nuclear weapons.
					
					 By this plan, the U.S. attempts at disrupting the balance of forces and realizing the world domination strategy.
					
					 The experts comment the U.S. plan to examine the main components of "overall momentary strike" in Korea in the future will be the "first product".
					
					 The U.S. remains unchanged in its sinister ambition to hold a military edge over other big powers in Asia-Pacific after stifling the DPRK by force and, furthermore, realize the ambition for world domination at any cost.
					
					 Now the U.S. is frittering away the funds to the tune of hundreds of billions of U.S. dollars collected from the people as taxes while crying out for producing tactical nuclear weapons capable of neutralizing the potential rivals' retaliatory will to challenge the U.S. domination policy through "restrained nuclear attack".
					
					 It has buckled down to nuclear weapons modernization to replace the 40 year-old intercontinental ballistic missiles with new ones while putting spurs to the development of new type nuclear weapons.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear ambition has assumed more frantic nature aimed at world domination after Trump took office.
					
					 It is the U.S. gangster-like logic that all the countries of the world have to live as slaves before its nuclear stick or die.
					
					 The U.S. is the largest cancer-like entity, a chief culprit threatening the world peace and security, being seized by the ambition for world domination.
					
					 All the countries loving justice and peace should be vigilant against the Trump administration's reckless nuclear weapons buildup and modernization moves.

articles.title: Provocateurs Can Never Escape Merciless Baptism of Fire: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Provocateurs Can Never Escape Merciless Baptism of Fire: KCNA Commentary 
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The situation on the Korean peninsula is inching close to the touch-and-go crisis.
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces began the largest-ever joint naval exercises in the East Sea and West Sea of Korea on Oct. 16 with the mobilization of the U.S. nuclear-powered carrier Ronald Reagan task force and nuclear submarine, more than 40 warships in all, nuclear strategic bombers, Stealth fighters and other air force.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet forces claim the exercises will be a "strong military warning message" to the DPRK and a demonstration of the substantial strike action against it in case a military countermeasure is chosen.
					
					 The exercises are timed to coincide with Trump's repeated crazy outbursts and the frequent military confabs of top military officials of the White House and the U.S. Defense Department envisaging "decapitation operation" targeting the supreme leadership of the DPRK. They are pushing the already acute situation on the Korean peninsula to the worst phase and seriously threatening peace and stability in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The saber-rattling the U.S. and the puppet forces are openly conducting at the doorstep of the DPRK hardens its determination to bolster the just nuclear retaliatory capabilities for stamping out the evil empire under the uplifted banner of simultaneously developing economy and nuclear force.
					
					 It is a vital issue on which hinges the rise and fall of the Korean nation to foil the U.S. criminal nuclear war scenario for stamping out the whole land of Korea and enslaving the whole Korean nation.
					
					 It is to defend the country and save the nation from the U.S. brigandish aggression and interference that the DPRK has bolstered the huge nuclear deterrence for self-defence despite manifold difficulties.
					
					 However, far from feeling gratitude for the measures taken by the DPRK for self-defence which fully guarantee the nation's security, the south Korean puppet forces are acting a shock brigade in executing their U.S. master's criminal nuclear war moves. This is an open indication of their will to regard the DPRK as rival, not as fellow countrymen.
					
					 Now mounting in south Korea are rebuff and indignation at the U.S. warmongers resorting to war hysteria while unhesitatingly letting out outbursts shocking the world.
					
					 Despite such mindset, the south Korean puppet forces are bringing the dark clouds of a war, chiming in with the U.S. master's zeal for aggression of the north. With nothing can such treacherous act be justified.
					
					 The Koreans in the north, the south and abroad will never pardon the south Korean authorities' criminal act as they are blindly making treachery, not understanding the trend of the times and who the chief culprit of the nation is.
					
					 The aggressors, provocateurs challenging the DPRK will never be able to escape merciless baptism of fire not only in the sky and land but also in the sea.

articles.title: Newspapers Criticize S. Korean Authorities' Pursuance of U.S.
articles.content:
Newspapers Criticize S. Korean Authorities' Pursuance of U.S.
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers of the DPRK Friday carry a signed commentary condemning the south Korean authorities' acts of kowtowing to the U.S.
					 Such rubbish as "fire and fury", "total destruction", "annihilation" and "calm before storm" are heard from Trump every day and the U.S. is keen on reckless play with fire by introducing nuclear bomber formation, nuclear carrier strike groups, nuclear submarines and Aegis into the sky and waters off the Korean peninsula in succession, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Dignitaries of White House, and State and Defense Departments of the U.S. are having a hard time cooling Trump overheated with a war fever, but only the south Korean puppet forces are fanning up the lunatic fingering a nuclear button.
					
					 What is ridiculous is the puppet forces' poor plight of being treated as a street girl even though they play the coquette with the U.S. and serve it with devotion.
					
					 The chief executive of south Korea should not just lament over his plight but meditate on its reason.
					
					 Now is the time for the south Korean authorities to grope for the new way of existence for their own security and interests as they are at the crossroads of pursuance of the U.S. or national independence.
					
					 They should deeply think about what is in their fundamental interests, what is not wanted by them, and if it is right from the geo-political and physiological point of view to antagonize the fellow countrymen and opt for subsisting with the help of the U.S. across the ocean.
					
					 History records weak nations which faced annihilation after acceding to "alliance" and "coalition" out of quick-witted calculation and also subject countries which saved their destiny by getting themselves away from the evil influence of big powers after becoming sensitive enough to understand the change of the times.
					
					 But it seems to us that the puppet forces can hardly get themselves free from the slavish way of thinking as they have been brainwashed by the U.S. so much that they are lost to independent strategic and political thinking faculty.
					
					 The south Korean authorities already forgot that the collapse of the Park Geun Hye regime was, in essence, attributable to its nature as puppet regime serving the U.S. and that the whole nation craved for a new history of national independence away from pro-Americanism when they took office on the crest of the people's mindset.
					
					 Now they should understand that the U.S. is not an entity to lean against. The darkness drooping low over America is sunset, not dawn, and no force can stop America from rushing headlong into downhill after over-living its era.
					
					 No wonder, such hooligan as thoughtless Trump is going on the rampage after becoming owner of White House, rendering the world restless.
					
					 So poor is the plight of the puppet forces as they are calling for "south Korea-U.S. alliance all-mightiness", not understanding that "Trump incident" is the symptom heralding the ruin of the old and ailing U.S., not just an accidental incident.
					
					 Lunatic Trump is running headlong into ruin, taking America with him, and the poor puppet forces are following him, at the peril of their lives.
					
					 It would be needless to regret when they are about to fall off a cliff of era, together with their master.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing Tasks of Second Plenary Meeting of Seventh C.C., WPK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing Tasks of Second Plenary Meeting of Seventh C.C., WPK 
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The Second Plenary Meeting of the Seventh Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea marks a turning point which put greater spurs to the all-people general offensive for the victory of socialism, meeting all  challenges of history, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an editorial.
					 It goes on:
					
					  The meeting was a significant one which demonstrated to the world the iron will of the WPK to open up the turning phase of the revolution and construction with bold and strenuous offensive and advance the socialist cause of Juche without an inch of deflection.
					
					 The international situation surrounding the DPRK remains very complicated.
					
					 A touch-and-go situation is prevailing on the Korean peninsula owing to the U.S. imperialists who spouted out the unethical remarks unprecedented in history calling for total destruction of the DPRK and its people at the UN stage and are going reckless in the moves to ignite a war by mobilizing all nuclear strategic assets.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un at the plenary meeting affirmed that the WPK would give full play to its correct leadership ability in order to settle accounts with the confrontation with the U.S. for centuries and accelerate the victory of the socialist cause.
					
					 The national power and position of the DPRK have reached the highest level and its inexhaustible potential of development is fully demonstrated day by day. 
					
					 The situation remains grim and a lot of difficulties and trials lie before our way but we have strong courage.
					
					 The editorial calls upon all service personnel and people to go all out for the implementation of the tasks of the Second Plenary Meeting of the Seventh C.C., the WPK full of faith in sure victory and optimism and thus bring about a new upsurge in the building of a powerful socialist nation.

articles.title: No One Has Right to Fault DPRK's Steps to Bolster up Its Nuclear Force: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No One Has Right to Fault DPRK's Steps to Bolster up Its Nuclear Force: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's  nuclear weapons are the precious fruition borne out by the Korean people through the bloody struggle to defend the destiny and sovereignty of the country from the protracted nuclear threat from the U.S. imperialists, says Rodong Sinmun in an article on Friday.
					 The article continues:
					
					 The nuclear issue was spawned on the Korean peninsula and the danger of a nuclear war has steadily escalated since then due to the sinister ambition of the U.S. to occupy the northern part of Korea and put Northeast Asia under its control for the realization of the world domination strategy.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea put forward a fresh strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward with the economic construction and the building of a nuclear force as required by the Korean revolution and the prevailing situation.
					
					 Witnessing the tragic situation in which strong-arm and arbitrary practices and brigandish logic of strength by imperialism are rampant in the international arena, the Korean people more keenly feel the validity and immutable truth of the new line.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are terming the DPRK's nuclear weapons as a "threat to the world peace".
					
					 According to the Asia-Pacific domination strategy, the U.S. is working hard to put Northeast Asia under its control and to dominate the whole of the Korean peninsula before anything else.
					
					 It is the strategic calculation of the U.S. that the control of the whole of the peninsula makes it possible for the U.S. to contain and pressurize China and Russia and to make a decisive breakthrough for realizing the ambition for world domination.
					
					 The U.S. is possessed of the nukes enough to plunge the world into a nuclear disaster several times. It is the Korean peninsula where the U.S. Asia-Pacific domination strategy and the strategic interests of other nuclear powers are intertwined. 
					
					 However, the DPRK's powerful nuclear deterrent averted a nuclear war several times under the touch-and-go situations in which a nuclear war might break out in the peninsula.
					
					 So no one has the right to find fault with DPRK's steps to rapidly bolster up the nuclear force in order to keep the practical equilibrium of forces with the U.S.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. for Seeking to Ignite Nuclear War
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. for Seeking to Ignite Nuclear War
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. finally kicked off the "high-intensity joint drill" against the DPRK in the waters off the Korean peninsula, together with the south Korean puppet forces.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary slams the saber-rattling as a dangerous action to ignite a nuclear war at any cost on the Korean peninsula on the eve of explosion. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is the chief criminal who increases the danger of a nuclear war on the peninsula every moment.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are seeking to ignite a total war against the DPRK anytime according to the already shaped scenario for operation when an opportunity presents itself during their drill with huge forces and nuclear strategic assets involved. 
					
					What should not be overlooked is the fact that high-ranking officials of the U.S. Defense Department flew into south Korea in camera and examined the evacuation operation of Americans all of a sudden under the situation where war drills for aggression take place every day. 
					
					 The U.S. forces present in south Korea are planning to kick off the drill again to evacuate Americans to Japan at the end of the month.
					
					 This reminds one of the eve of the Korean war provoked by the U.S. imperialists in 1950. 
					
					 When the crow flies, her tail follows. The warmongers' saber-rattling being staged for nearly one year goes to clearly prove that they are working hard to ignite a war for aggression at any cost on the peninsula.
					
					 The present situation proves once again how just the DPRK's measures for bolstering up the nuclear deterrent for self defense is.
					
					 The U.S. had better not forget in a moment that the army and people of the DPRK are sharpening the sword for retaliation under the uplifted slogan "Annihilate the U.S. imperialist aggressors, the sworn enemy of the Korean people!"

articles.title: S. Korea: Youths Protest against U.S. War Moves
articles.content:
S. Korea: Youths Protest against U.S. War Moves
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The members of the Youth Resistance Movement staged a struggle outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Oct. 17 to protest the U.S. largest-ever joint naval maneuver escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula, according to the south Korean online paper Minjok Ilbo.
					 They charged that Trump made bellicose remarks calling for "total destruction" of the north, bringing in waters off Korea lots of various type weapons for a nuclear war.
					
					 They chanted slogans such as "U.S., stop war drill against the north at once!" and "U.S. troops, leave this land with THAAD!".

articles.title: S. Korea: Police's Purchase of Suppressive Means Disclosed
articles.content:
S. Korea: Police's Purchase of Suppressive Means Disclosed
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- A member of the Minju Party of south Korea disclosed on Oct. 17 the fact that the puppet police introduced iron saw, iron chain cutter, iron stick and many other suppressive hardware to crack down the people's rally in 2015, according Voice of People, a south Korean internet newspaper.
					 He said that at the time of the all-people rally the Seoul district police agency purchased more than 100 equipment of 18 varieties to be used for suppressing the rally.
					
					 It was very shocking that the police agency purchased lots of repressive means to put down the demonstration, he said, calling on the police to repent of its past crimes.

articles.title: Authorities' Hostile Policy toward DPRK Blasted in S. Korea
articles.content:
Authorities' Hostile Policy toward DPRK Blasted in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The South Kyongsang Provincial headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration and the South Kyongsang Provincial Progressive Federation called a press conference on Oct. 17 to demand that the authorities stop the military exercises bringing a war and withdraw hostile policy toward the DPRK, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 They said that the carrier task force of the U.S., with nuclear carrier Ronald Reagan as a prototype, was conducting large-scale naval exercises combined with a drill for striking key facilities in the north and anti-submarine exercises.
					
					 This is a military threat with the intensive deployment of forces enough to mount preemptive strike any time, they said.
					
					 The north already warned of military action including a salvo of missiles into waters near the U.S. territory of Guam and therefore it is clear that if the U.S. nuclear carrier commits an advance into the north, there will occur serious military conflict.
					
					 The regime claims opposition to war but, in fact, it is calling for sanctions and pressure, straining the tension in close cooperation with the U.S. military action, they charged.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Calls for Abolition of "SL"
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Calls for Abolition of "SL"
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Voice of People on Oct. 18 carried an editorial urging the abolition of the fascist "Security Law".
					 The editorial said that the prosecution threw a painter behind bars on the charge of violation of the SL, claiming that his work "rice-transplantation" praised the north and confiscated the work.
					
					 It called for abolishing the SL which suppresses the freedom of expression and thought.

articles.title: Inaugural Ceremony of People's Party Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Inaugural Ceremony of People's Party Held in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- An inauguration ceremony of the People's Party was held in Seoul plaza on Oct. 15, according to the south Korean online paper Thongil News.
					 A declaration was read out at the ceremony.
					
					 It said that the politics for the people is the top political task today.
					
					 It claimed the south Korean politics has one-sidedly patronized foreign and conservative forces, less than one percent of the population.
					
					 It also declared that the party would organize the action of the people for victory and usher in the era of their victory when the people themselves emerge main players in politics.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia 
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The Kiselyoba Publishing House of Russia published in booklet Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Bring About Innovations in Agricultural Production under the Unfurled Banner of the Socialist Rural Theses" with due ceremony on October 9 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd founding anniversary.
					  The work, published on Feb. 6, Juche 103 (2014), deals with great changes in the socialist rural construction of the DPRK since the publication of the Theses on the Socialist Rural Question (Feb. 25, 1964). It indicates the tasks and ways for finally settling the rural question.

articles.title: DPRK's Holidays Celebrated in Germany
articles.content:
DPRK's Holidays Celebrated in Germany
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- Political parties and organizations of Germany held celebrations, seminars and solidarity meetings from Sept. 21 to Oct. 10 to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd founding anniversary.
					 Torsten Schoevitz, chairman of the Communist Party of Germany, said:
					
					 The WPK has led the Korean revolution to victory for over 70 years thanks to the great leaders.
					
					 The Democratic People's Republic of Korea is staunchly advancing along the road of independence against imperialism under the unfurled banner of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 The U.S. which is regarding the DPRK as a thorn in its flesh is openly talking about a military option while intentionally inciting hostility toward the DPRK.
					
					 We bitterly denounce the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and fully support the just cause of the WPK and the Korean people.
					
					 Manfred Schneider, chief of the German Group for the Study of Korean Culture, said the WPK is the genuine motherly party as it is taking care of the people in a responsible manner and pursuing politics for them.
					
					 Thomas Lichter, vice-chairman of the Federal Republic of Germany-DPRK Association, noted that through his visit to the DPRK he was greatly encouraged by the Korean people leading an optimistic life despite any difficulties. Any move of the U.S. can not block the vigorous advance of the WPK and the Korean people, he added.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said the powerful war deterrence of the DPRK is reliably protecting global peace and security from the reckless threats of a nuclear war by the imperialists. The WPK headed by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un will be ever-victorious, he added.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events.

articles.title: Publicada declaracion de vocero de Comision para la Investigacion de Danos de Sanciones
articles.content:
Publicada declaracion de vocero de Comision para la Investigacion de Danos de Sanciones
Pyongyang, 20 de octubre (ACNC) -- El portavoz de la Comision de la RPDC para la Investigacion de los Danos de las Sanciones hizo publica hoy la siguiente declaracion:
					La campana de sancion y aplastamiento de EE.UU. y sus satelites se torna tan brutal e inculta con el objetivo de suprimir el derecho a subsistencia y desarrollo de nuestro Estado y pueblo y hacer al mundo volver a la edad medieval destruyendo la civilizacion contemporanea.
					
					En violacion del parrafo de la "resolucion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que estipula que esa campana no afecta las actividades de cooperacion humanitaria de los aparatos de la ONU, sus garras se extienden hasta a estas labores que marchan de manera transparente.
					
					Ellas tienen lugar en todas las regiones y paises del mundo porque contribuyen al cumplimiento de la noble meta de la ONU de garantizar la paz y seguridad del mundo, desarrollar las relaciones internacionales y promover la cooperacion internacional en varias esferas como economia, sociedad y cultura.
					
					Sin embargo, insatisfechos de su inaudita campana de sancion y aplastamiento encaminada a bloquear totalmente las normales actividades economicas y comerciales de la RPDC y acabar con su elemental derecho a la existencia, EE.UU. y sus seguidores obstaculizan en todos los sentidos el cumplimiento de los proyectos de cooperacion de los aparatos de la ONU en nuestro pais.
					
					A diferencia de lo que sucede en otros paises, las labores de todos los aparatos de la ONU, inclusive PNUD, UNICEF y el Fondo de la Poblacion, estan bajo el control riguroso del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					Como resultado, se bloquea el canal de remision de los fondos de cooperacion de los aparatos de la ONU y se dilata la entrega de suministros.
					
					Para colmo, sufren limitaciones hasta los articulos de uso cotidiano de la poblacion so pretexto de doble uso, lo cual causa enormes danos a la proteccion de derechos y la existencia de ninos y mujeres y a la economia civil y la vida poblacional de nuestro pais.
					
					Se dice que impotentes de resistir el fuerte rechazo de nacionales y extranjeros, EE.UU. y sus seguidores permitieron el servicio de remision de fondos de cooperacion para los aparatos de la ONU en nuestro pais, pero ellos no toman ninguna medida sustancial.
					
					Asi quedo suspendido ese servicio y estancada la cooperacion.
					
					Bajo pretextos injustos, se ha demorado varios meses en los lugares de venta y escala la entrega de los equipos moviles Roentgen y reactivos para el diagnosis de tuberculosis, el insecticida anti-malaria y los aparatos medicos de asistencia al parto que compran y suministran este ano UNICEF y el Fondo de la Poblacion y otras organizaciones de la ONU para el fomento de salud de ninos y mujeres.
					
					A partir de 2017, no llega ninguno de los reactivos para la diagnosis de los pacientes de tuberculosis resistente a medicinas.
					
					Los hechos mencionados constituyen evidente violacion de DDHH que niega e infringe el derecho a disfrutar la vida en el nivel suficiente para mantener la salud y bienestar, inclusive la ropa, el alimento y la vivienda, la asistencia medica y los servicios sociales estipulados en la Declaracion Mundial de Derechos Humanos.
					
					Asi se hace evidente que el objetivo de sancion no esta en "frenar el desarrollo de armas", como insisten EE.UU. y sus satelites, sino en derrocar nuestro regimen al aislar y asfixiar a nuestro pais y acarrear intencionalmente el desastre humanitario.
					
					Mientras las fuerzas hostiles mantengan la campana de sancion y presion mas dura de la historia, levantaremos mas alto la bandera de independencia, desarrollo paralelo y autoconfianza para frustrar tajantemente esa sucia maniobra y las imprudentes tentativas de los enemigos de desatar la guerra nuclear.
					
					Ademas, ajustaremos hasta el final las cuentas de todas las perdidas de sancion.

articles.title: Portavoz de CNCDP condena locuras militares de belicistas norteamericanos
articles.content:
Portavoz de CNCDP condena locuras militares de belicistas norteamericanos
Pyongyang, 20 de octubre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que propasa la aventura militar de los belicistas norteamericanos enloquecidos por la ambicion anacronica para aplastar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) publico el dia 19 la siguiente declaracion:
					Informando el dia 10 a Trump en la sede del Pentagono los planes militares contra la RPDC, los cabecillas de la capa militar de EE.UU. debatieron de manera intensiva las opciones militares que probablemente no extenderian a la guerra total, minimizarian sus perdidas y podrian concluir en un tiempo mas corto posible con el golpe preventivo e inesperado.
					
					Entre ellas, seleccionaron como plan apropiado la "operacion de descabezamiento" combinado con la guerra cibernetica y segun ella, simularon durante largo tiempo la correcta definicion de posicion de la direccion suprema del Norte (de Corea) por los satelites, drones y otros medios sofisticados de reconocimiento y vigilancia, el ataque preciso por los bombarderos estrategicos nucleares y otros medios de ataque a larga distancia, la destruccion de las importantes instalaciones y las bases nucleares y de misiles del Norte segun la infiltracion de las unidades de operaciones especiales y el uso practico de la guerra cibernetica basada en el virus maligno Stuxnet, etc.
					
					Esto muestra que EE.UU. ya inicio en efecto la guerra sin declaracion contra la RPDC segun el guion peligrosisimo.
					
					La Peninsula Coreana se hallo en un estado pesimo en que no puede frenar el estallido de la guerra nuclear.
					
					Domar con fuego a los maniacos de guerra es el modo de enfrentamiento invariable y rotundo de Corea del Juche.
					
					El ejercito y pueblo coreanos tienen la ferrea voluntad de aniquilar hasta el ultimo de los desafiadores a la direccion suprema de la RPDC.
					
					Como ya hemos aclarado, daremos a EE.UU. no las "perdidas minimas" sino la destruccion mas tragica y el exterminio del territorio estadounidense, mediante las contramedidas superintransigentes e inimaginables, si EE.UU. provoca la guerra de algun tipo al fin y al cabo sin volver en si.
					
					En el caso de que la actual situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se ponga mas critica, su responsabilidad recaera totalmente sobre EE.UU.

articles.title: Presidente de Mali se refiere a las relaciones de amistad con la RPDC
articles.content:
Presidente de Mali se refiere a las relaciones de amistad con la RPDC
Pyongyang, 20 de octubre (ACNC) -- El embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Chong Gyong, presento el dia 6 sus cartas credenciales ante el presidente de la Republica de Mali, Ibrahim Boubacar Keita.
					En esta ocasion, el mandatario dijo que las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises son las historicas preparadas por Su Excelencia ex Presidente Modibo Keita y Su Excelencia Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					
					El gobierno y pueblo de la RPDC brindaron con sinceridad el apoyo mental y material al desarrollo independiente y la construccion de nueva sociedad del gobierno y pueblo de Mali, recordo.
					
					Senalo que las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises preparadas por Su Excelencia Presidente Kim Il Sung se fortalecieron por Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il y continuan hoy dia por Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Destaco que cada pais tiene el derecho a defender su soberania y la comunidad internacional debe respetar los derechos soberanos de cada pais. 
					
					Apunto que a traves de la TV, vio el panorama de Pyongyang cambiada maravillosamente y pudo conocer grandes cambios que acontecen en la construccion economica y en el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo de la RPDC.

articles.title: Clausurada exposicion cientifico-tecnica internacional de muebles y materiales de construccion de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Clausurada exposicion cientifico-tecnica internacional de muebles y materiales de construccion de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 20 de octubre (ACNC) -- Quedo clausurada la exposicion cientifico-tecnica internacional de muebles y materiales de construccion de Pyongyang que habia sido inaugurada el dia 16.
					Se ganaron buena evaluacion los articulos presentados por el Combinado de Materiales de Construccion Chollima, la Fabrica de Maderas de Pyongyang, la Compania Mixta de Muebles de Yonggwang, la Compania Comanditaria de Tecnologia de Jonghyang de Pyongyang y la Compania Comanditaria de Wonbong y las companias extranjeras.
					
					Durante la exposicion, tuvo lugar el seminario tecnico de diferentes temas.
					
					La ceremonia de cierre se efectuo el dia 20 en el Palacio de Ciencias y Tecnicas con la participacion de los funcionarios, investigadores y profesores de los comites, ministerios, organos centrales, instituciones de ciencia y educacion y otras unidades vinculadas, asi como las delegaciones de varios paises y regiones.
